properties.areaDesc: Waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 NM; Charlotte Harbor and Pine Island Sound; Waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued January 4 at 12:18PM EST until January 4 at 12:45PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a

* Special Marine Warning for...
Charlotte Harbor and Pine Island Sound...
Coastal waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 NM...
Coastal waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 NM...
Waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 to 60 NM...
Waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 to 60 NM...

* Until 1245 PM EST.

* At 1217 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing
waterspouts was located 20 nm west of Manasota Key, moving
northeast at 35 knots.

HAZARD...Waterspouts and wind gusts 34 knots or greater.

SOURCE...Radar.

IMPACT...Waterspouts can quickly form and capsize boats, damage
vessels, and create suddenly higher waves. Make sure all
on board are in a secure location and wearing life
jackets. Expect wind gusts in excess of 34 knots,
suddenly higher waves, frequent lightning, and heavy
downpours. Make sure all on board are wearing life
jackets.

* Locations impacted include...
Englewood, M15 Reef, M9 Reef, Venice Inlet, Manasota Key, Siesta
Key, Venice, M17 Reef, Lynn Silvertooth Reef, Big Sarasota Pass,
M10 Reef, Md4 Reef, M16 Reef, Don Pedro Island and New Pass.
